text.text_translated:
Good relationships help people feel happy and healthy.  
A study showed happy people are close to friends and family.  
They spend time with them often.  
You need at least one person for self‑disclosure.  
Self‑disclosure means talking about personal feelings.  
One deep talk with that person is enough.  
You also need other people around you.  
Having many friends only for music or football is not enough.  
It is very important to have this deep friendship.  
Some people need to learn to listen well.  
If they listen well, they can make better relationships.

A study showed happy people have strong ties to friends and family.  
They spend time with them often.  
You need at least one person for self‑disclosure.  
Self‑disclosure means talking about personal feelings.  
One deep talk with that person is enough.
